pages.text: As you're travelling around the world, you'll find a lot of new things that aren't always obvious as to what they are.$(br2)This is where $(thing)WAILA (What Am I Looking At)$() comes in!$(2br)Whenever you look at a block or mob in the world, a helpful tooltip will show up at the top of the screen with what the thing is, and which mod it's from.

For many blocks, $(thing)WAILA$() shows additional information, such as the items they contain and the progress of the crafting recipe being created.$(2br)When looking at $(item)grass$() or $(item)dirt$() blocks in the world, it will show you the $(thing)air temperature$() and $(thing)rainfall$() for the area, which can be useful when deciding which crops to plant.
